wikipedia_page.main: Nahid Majid, OBE (Bengali: নায়াহিদ মাঝিদ; born 19 June 1964) is a Bangladeshi-born British Civil servant, chief operating officer for Regeneration Investment Organisation at UK Trade & Investment, Deputy Director within the Department for Work and Pensions and former urban planner. She is currently the most senior British Bangladeshi Muslim woman in the civil service.

response: * Nahid Majid, Associate Director, Turner & Townsend (Head of Regeneration PM Sector). For services to Diversity.

* Nahid Majid OBE – Civil servant, Chief Operating Officer of Regeneration Investment Organisation and Deputy Director within the Department for Work and Pensions. She is currently the most senior British Bangladeshi Muslim woman in the civil service.
